text: Aur yun kehney kay baees kay hum ney Allah kay rasool maseeh essa bin marium ko qatal ker diya halankay na to enhon ney ussay qatal kiya na sooli charhaya bulkay inn kay liye unn (essa) ki shabeeh bana diya gaya tha. Yaqeen jano kay hazrat essa (alh-e-salam) kay baray mein ikhtilaf kerney walay unn kay baray mein shak mein hain unhen iss ka koi yaqeen nahi ba-juz takhmeeni baaton per amal kerney kay itna yaqeeni hai kay enhon ney unhen qatal nahi kiya
